author: Felix Colgrave
description:
Get the album!! 👉 https://felixcolgrave.bandcamp.com/ 👈
Longer versions of all the paper loop music, also by me.

You may have seen these individually on my YouTube shorts, but here they are for you to watch again, or for the first time!

So what are these? Why have I made so many??

Well, on my Patreon, I have a top tier where I send someone a drawing in the mail every month. I started Patreon to fund my animated film projects though, and not to do lots of drawings, so to make sure it didn’t eat into other projects I capped it at 25 people. That way I thought, I could just do a warm-up sketch every morning before work, and I’d have enough to send each month.
But! I wasn’t that good at doing a warm-up drawing every day, so I’d often have a backlog of drawings to do at the end of each month, and it got hard thinking of 25 different things to draw each time.

Then in 2020, I realised if the 25 drawings were frames within an animation, then I only had to think of ONE thing to draw each m
title: PAPER LOOPS Season 2
